p.e:
I DECIDED I WANTED A MORE SUNNY ATMOSPHERE
WHILE I WORKED ON STUFF. BUT I CAN CHANGE IT
WHENEVER YOU LIKE.  OR YOU CAN, OBVIOUSLY.

I FINISHED THE BOKCASE, LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU
THINK.I AM NOW WORKING ON SOME BOOKS TO PUT
IN IT. I'M GOING TO MAKE A VARIETY OF BOOKS SO
THEY WON'T ALL LOOK THE SAME.
